w: Gene Review: SHORT Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: SHORT syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,"short stature, hyperextensibility, hernia, ocular depression, Rieger anomaly, and teething delay"
What is (are) Ochoa syndrome ?,"Ochoa syndrome is a disorder characterized by urinary problems a
